name: High school fantasy
description:
High school fantasy is a short Visual Novel.

In High school fantasy, follow the story of Dan, just your average high school guy. Dan is a 19-year-old guy in his last year of high school. He lives with two hot stepsisters.PlotYou wake up. You look at a picture of your family, which is placed on a nightstand next to your bed. You are an adopted child with two sisters (not related by blood). You are single and you want a girlfriend badly! That is your mission for the day. Will you be able to accomplish it? You make the choices, so your destiny is in your hands.Features
  • lounge background music
  • multiple endings
  • hot girls
  • realistic backgrounds
